channel.title: '`Realm of Heroes`' [Development Team][PI]
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/realmofheroesbanner1.jpg[/img]
Has been shut down and is scheduled for release. Sorry everyone who applied and/or was accepted for the development team.[/center]

item.title: '`Realm of Heroes`' [Development Team][PI]
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

I’m releasing it guys, didn’t turn out to be the game I planned it to be. Sorry for all of you who applied and/or where accepted for part of the development team.

Read full topic

item.title: '`Realm of Heroes`' [Development Team][PI]
item.dc:creator: @james_adams james adams
item.description:
@james_adams wrote:

Position wanted: In-game Administrator

Experience: 3 years. I’ve run 2 of my own servers, been a Co-Owner on PwnXile and I am a moderator on Legacy 614.

Any past work we can see or someone we can talk to to make sure?: N/A

Will you follow the rules and not abuse your powers?: Of course, I hate corrupt communities and staff, I would help people out as much as I possibly could.

Will you complete your work and not slack off/not do your job?: Always the kind of person who doesn’t sleep until my work is finished

Why do you think you’d benefit Realm of Heroes?: I think I’d benefit the server because other than skating, I have alot of free time, and would be able to help alot of the community. I could also help with any server work or website work if ever needed.

Why do you want this job?: I want this job because I like to join new communities, it also looks like a very interesting project and would love to be a part of it.

Read full topic

item.title: '`Realm of Heroes`' [Development Team][PI]
item.dc:creator: @OmgItsShane Shane
item.description:
@OmgItsShane wrote:

Position wanted: Forum Admin/In-game Admin/Mod

Experience: 4 years on and on.

Any past work we can see or someone we can talk to to make sure?: Lots of People

Will you follow the rules and not abuse your powers?: Yep Yep

Will you complete your work and not slack off/not do your job?: I never Slack. (Never Slack Policy)

Why do you think you’d benefit Realm of Heroes?: Because I could make you thrive and have a great active community and control everyone in a stable server environment. I will not let one day by, by either checking Forums or in-game for players suspicious acts or abusive Acts.

Why do you want this job?: Because this looks really nice and I’m interested highly.

Any additional information: My name is Shane, I can Skype my Skype is ikilliwin search it up. I’m 14 years old I have been coding since I was 10 I couldn’t really program til I was 12 though. Joined mopar when I was 13 :). (Mopar ftw <3)

Read full topic

item.title: '`Realm of Heroes`' [Development Team][PI]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Position wanted: Ingame admin

Experience: 6 years runescape 3 years rsps.

Any past work we can see or someone we can talk to to make sure?: Do i have to show you work to apply for admin?

Will you follow the rules and not abuse your powers?:Yes.

Will you complete your work and not slack off/not do your job?:Yes.

Why do you think you’d benefit Realm of Heroes?:Because i would be very dedicated to the server
and would play a lot and help out the community a bunch

Why do you want this job?:I have nothing better to do and this server looks good so thats why i want the job.

Any additional information:I am able to play a lot of hours on week days and weekends and my msn is kingrsps@hotmail.com
my laptop has problems with skype for w.e. reason so i cant use it…

Read full topic

item.title: '`Realm of Heroes`' [Development Team][PI]
item.dc:creator: @PkerzOwnerofPKTillDe PkerzOwnerofPKTillDeath
item.description:
@PkerzOwnerofPKTillDe wrote:

[quote=“hawkgames, post:28, topic:391549”][quote author=PkerzOwnerofPKTillDeath link=topic=488713.msg3578355#msg3578355 date=1303602676]
Position wanted: Forum & In Game Admin & GFX Designer

Experience: 5 1/2 years on RS, Owner, Old CrisisX Moderator, Nicks 508 Admin.

Any past work we can see or someone we can talk to to make sure?: Eh, well all the server I played are down… But if you would like to see my GFX work I would be glad to show you

Will you follow the rules and not abuse your powers?: Of course!

Will you complete your work and not slack off/not do your job?: Slack off? I will NEVER!

Why do you think you’d benefit Realm of Heroes?: Well, the players would due to my Loyalty to my old servers and my experince, also not to mention me

Why do you want this job?: I want to have a more orderly server, and I would be lying if I said I don’t want to have fun

Any additional information: I am VERY mature, I still am flexible and I go on whenever I can!
[/quote]

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

What does 5 years of runescape have to do.[/quote]
Thanks, added more info!
Anyway, 5 years of RS means I know different combos, and old glitches that use to occur on RS

Read full topic

item.title: '`Realm of Heroes`' [Development Team][PI]
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Position wanted: Server / Forum mod

Experience: Since 07

Any past work we can see or someone we can talk to to make sure?: For a mod? Idk, but if you know me on the forums, I’m not a fucking idiot.

Will you follow the rules and not abuse your powers?: Who would say yes to this? Bad question.

Will you complete your work and not slack off/not do your job?: I’m just gonna mute / ban / warn people. What else do mods do.

Why do you think you’d benefit Realm of Heroes?: Because you only have 1 mod so far

Why do you want this job?: I’m bored and this kills time

Any additional information: I’m not gonna bullshit an application and say “Oh yes, I wanna play this server to make a difference in the world of private servers!”, no I’m just gonna be honest. I’ve been around here for awhile and I’m well respected. Turning me down would be a grave mistake.

Read full topic

@vrac_defiled wrote:

Position wanted: Ingame Admin

Experience: 3 years

Any past work we can see or someone we can talk to to make sure?: Unfortunately, no…
I created a server and posted it on mopar, but it was 2 years ago and now I cannot find it anymore.

Will you follow the rules and not abuse your powers?: I always do

Will you complete your work and not slack off/not do your job?: Of course

Why do you think you’d benefit Realm of Heroes?: Because I can also code (not the best but I can do some coding). However, I quit coding so I will not be a full-time coder, only a backup.

Why do you want this job?: I want this job because I qui all RSPS a month ago and I miss it XD

Any additional information: 16, I live in Canada, name is max and skype username is maximalx5

item.title: '`Realm of Heroes`' [Development Team][PI]
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:15, topic:391549”]I gladly reference xx weed xx as a forum developer. I have been on several of his server/forums and he is excellent in php/html/c++.

To be honest, I don’t see much you have done, there are a couple of summoning bases out there and Hybrid PvP #3 had the pets already anyway.[/quote]I’ve done a lot more than add pets lol. Just an example picture for anyone who wants to take a look at the server.

@ AS75150

Accepted as Ingame Administrator.

If you don’t already have a skype account, please make one. If you do, pm me your username.

@ PLayRooney

I want an experienced staff so players can get the best help and most fun possible. And please pm me your skype, haven’t gotten a message from you yet.

Read full topic

item.title: '`Realm of Heroes`' [Development Team][PI]
item.dc:creator: @AS75150 AS75150
item.description:
@AS75150 wrote:

Application

Position wanted: Ingame Administrator.

Experience: about 3 years

Any past work we can see or someone we can talk to to make sure?: i really have no one but ive ran about 4 servers

Will you follow the rules and not abuse your powers?: Of course i love to see people have a good time and i know i can help them if they need it

Will you complete your work and not slack off/not do your job?: I will do my job i will also get a schedule of when ill be able to get on after school is out

Why do you think you’d benefit Realm of Heroes?: i hope i can make it a awesome hangout for players who have nothing else to do.

Why do you want this job?: im tired of coding and i think it will ease the stress of trying to code a server less than working and having fun on one
Any additional information: umm im 17 turning 18 may 13th i have some experience in 562 coding i can usually answer a question having dealt with java development i can host, make a website/forum, so on and on

Read full topic
